title: Time Management Ninja: 21 Rules for More Time and Less Stress in Your Life
description: "This book will help you own your calendar, block time for what matters most and reclaim your life." --Paula Rizzo, author of Listful A List-Making Journey to a Less Stressed YouYou want more time to spend with family, to achieve big goals, and to simply enjoy life. Yet, there seem to be more and more things competing for your time, and more distractions interrupting your day.Craig Jarrow has spent many years testing time management tactics, tools, and systems and written hundreds of articles on productivity, goals, and organization, Through it all he's learned a simple Time management should be easy, not complicated and unwieldy. And it shouldn't take up more of your precious time than it gives back!Time Management Ninja offers 21 rules that will show you an easier and more effective way to take control of your time and manage your busy life. Follow these simple principles and get more done with less effort. It's no-stress, uncomplicated time management that works."Read this book, apply its rules, and you'll find freedom." --Hyrum Smith, bestselling author of Purposeful Retirement
author: Craig Jarrow
